title: Scarred
description: **Mature Content Warning** Recommended for ages 17+ due to language,sexual content and explicit drug references.Hi. My name is Jordan. I never had the perfect life as a child but I wasn't abused. More like confused. I grew up in one crazy family, but they only made me the person I am today. Well, let's just say that they built the mold until I was sixteen. Life has a way of smacking you around sometimes. My life, after sixteen; well let's just say that I was sucker-punched. How many rounds do you think I can take or will I just cut and run the minute the whistle sounds?I am scarred, alone, and vulnerable; fighting everyone, including myself in self preservation.Will I find redemption, my own peace of mind?Scarred is Book 1 of the SCARS SERIES.
author: C.R. Gress
